name: Lululemon Athletica Inc.
description: Lululemon Athletica Inc. is a premium athletic apparel retailer based in Vancouver, Canada, known for its high-quality yoga, running, and workout clothing. Founded in 1998 by Chip Wilson, Lululemon has built a strong brand centered around the philosophy of mindfulness and wellness. The company offers a range of technical athletic apparel for men and women, as well as accessories and personal care products. Lululemon's signature items include yoga pants, sports bras, and shorts, all designed with performance, comfort, and style in mind. The brand has gained a loyal following by fostering a community-focused approach, encouraging customers to engage in fitness and wellness activities. In addition to retail operations, Lululemon hosts fitness classes and events to promote an active lifestyle. The company is also committed to sustainability and ethical sourcing, aiming to minimize its environmental impact through responsible practices in manufacturing and materials. With a growing presence in international markets, Lululemon continues to expand its product offerings and reach, striving to inspire individuals to live their best lives through movement and mindfulness.

seo.meta_title: Lululemon Athletica Inc. | Premium Athletic Apparel and Accessories
seo.meta_description: Explore Lululemon Athletica, a leader in premium athletic apparel, dedicated to inspiring a healthy lifestyle through high-quality products and community engagement.

faq.question: What does Lululemon sell?
faq.answer: Lululemon sells premium athletic apparel for yoga, running, and other fitness activities, along with accessories.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lululemon?
faq.answer: Calvin McDonald is the CEO of Lululemon Athletica Inc.

faq.question: Where is Lululemon headquartered?
faq.answer: Lululemon is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What are Lululemon's main products?
faq.answer: Lululemon's main products include yoga pants, sports bras, shorts, and various fitness accessories.
